courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 01 - Application Lifecycle Management
courses.description: Learn how to deploy, update, rollback, configure, scale and self heal an application.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 02 - Installation, Configuration & Validation
courses.description: Learn how to design, configure, secure, provision, test and manage a Kubernetes Cluster.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 03 - Core Concepts
courses.description: Learn how to use the Kubernetes API, Services and other concepts.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 04 - Networking
courses.description: Learn how to configure the networking infrastructure of Pods, Cluster nodes and load balancers.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 06 - Security
courses.description: Learn how to configure authentication, authorization, network policies, TLS certificates and secure images.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 07 - Cluster Maintenance
courses.description: Learn how to upgrade, backup and restore Kubernetes Clusters.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 08 - Logging/Monitoring
courses.description: Learn how to monitor and manage all cluster components, applications and application logs.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 09 - Storage
courses.description: Learn how to create and configure persistent storage volumes.

courses.title: Certified Kubernetes Administrator - 10 - Troubleshooting
courses.description: Learn how to troubleshoot failure of an application, a control plane, a worker node and networking infrastructure.
